EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_T-Mobile Workshop_Q116.Confirmation - Bothell
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Cloud Foundry Workshop on {{lead.PCF Session Date:default=edit me}}. See event details below.
Time: 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM Location: Canyon Pointe <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Canyon+Pointe+South,+22309+30th+Dr+SE,+Bothell,+WA+98021/@47.7962295,-122.1961535,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x54900f1bc156da3f:0xafaadf5586c2015]]> 22309 30th Drive SE, Bothell, WA 98021 Room: CPS - 3rd floor
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-foundry-workshop/]]>.
